title: Scientific Reasoning Enhancement Program Using Inquiry-Based Illustrated Storybooks

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic scientific concepts and observational skills for everyday experiences
context.additional_context: Integrating Digital Collaboration Tools via Personal Devices (BYOD) to Create and Utilize Customized Illustrated Storybooks Visualizing Scientific Reasoning Processes

learning_goals: Learners can analyze inquiry-based picture storybooks and derive at least three-step logical reasoning processes in scientific problem situations
Learners can set up and verify scientific hypotheses through PBL team activities and write inquiry reports.
Learners can express scientific reasoning results as visual storyboards and receive peer evaluations.

resources: Illustrated storybook template with scientific reasoning scenarios
Inquiry activity kit (experiment tools, observation notebook)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
